Plot

plot.gengraph.Rd

A wrapper around igraphs plot method for gengraph objects

# S3 method for gengraph
plot(x, vc = NULL, ...)

Arguments

x

A gengraph object
vc

Named character vector; the names are the vertices and the elements are the colors of the nodes
...

Extra arguments. See the igraph package

Examples

d  <- subset(digits, class == "1")[, 20:30]
g  <- fit_graph(d)
#>  Edges: 1 of 55 - delta-qic = 0.474001 
#>  Edges: 2 of 55 - delta-qic = 0.447847 
#>  Edges: 3 of 55 - delta-qic = 0.162612 
#>  Edges: 4 of 55 - delta-qic = 0.001473 
#>  Edges: 5 of 55 - delta-qic = 0 
vs <- colnames(d)
vcol <- structure(vector("character", length(vs)), names = vs)
vcol[1:4]  <- "lightsteelblue2"
vcol[5:7]  <- "orange"
vcol[8:11] <- "pink"
plot(g, vcol)
